divs: Sighting Detailsmy friend and i saw one yellow triangle with three lights traveling away from the point. right after we saw four red lights moving together. twenty min later we saw stars moving fast across the sky in all different directions five of them in fifteen min.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Villa Park
There were no other sightings in Villa Park on or around June 18th 2010
Summary: We saw a yellow triangle after that a red line of lites then star like moving across the sky in different directions five of them within twenty minutes.
